data.actual_result: The Ongoing Call bar disappears, but does not properly return after the keyboard is closed until the app is restarted / opening and closing user settings.
data.expected_result: The Ongoing Call bar will disappear temporarily until the keyboard is closed.
data.short_description: When the navigation bar is hidden, the Ongoing Call bar at the bottom of a group DM will disappear and not return after the keyboard is closed.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure the navigation bar is in hidden mode - Have members of a group DM you're in start a call without you - Open up the keyboard by clicking on the message bar
